phrases.text: Tôi bước chân vào giáo trống ơ
phrases.english: I/subject bước [?] leg/foot enter drill/teach drum oh

culturalContext.description: As the opening phrase, this establishes the song's emotional tone and invites audience engagement.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Opening phrases in Vietnamese folk songs often use vocatives (ơi, này) to grab attention before the narrative begins
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions
culturalContext.musicalContext: The 7-syllable structure (lục bát's "bát" variant) allows extended melodic development and is common in literary songs. As the opening phrase, it establishes the tonal center and introduces the melodic motif that will be varied throughout.

phrases.text: Tìm đến Thượng chúc cho minh
phrases.english: (name: Tìm) arrive (name: Thượng) wish for/to minh [?]

culturalContext.description: This narrative phrase contributes to the song's narrative structure and emotional arc, typical of Northern folk traditions.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions
Đàn tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are 20th century innovations - originals were vocal
culturalContext.musicalContext: The 6-syllable structure (song lục) balances melody with text, common in Southern traditions.

phrases.text: Năm trống cơm thiên hạ thái bình
phrases.english: five drum cooked rice heaven hạ [?] thái [?] peaceful/vase

phrases.text: Năm trống cơm nhà no mọi đủ
phrases.english: five drum cooked rice house no [?] every/all đủ [?]

phrases.text: Năm trống cơm mọi vẻ mọi hay
phrases.english: five drum cooked rice every/all manner/appearance every/all or/know

culturalContext.description: This narrative phrase contributes to the song's narrative structure and emotional arc, typical of Northern folk traditions.

phrases.text: Được mùa hoa thẳng lấy cơm bưng trống ơ
phrases.english: can/able season flower straight take/marry cooked rice bưng [?] drum oh

culturalContext.description: Flowers ("hoa") are metaphors for young women and fleeting youth. Different flowers mark seasons: mai for Tết, lotus for summer, chrysanthemum for autumn. As the closing phrase, this provides resolution and often returns to opening themes for circular structure.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions
Đàn tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are 20th century innovations - originals were vocal
culturalContext.musicalContext: As the closing phrase, it typically returns to the tonic note and may quote the opening melody for circular structure.
